topic: Cultural shifts towards sustainability in solar energy adoption
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that interdisciplinary insights, particularly those focused on human behavior and societal trends, can reveal unexpected opportunities in the solar energy sector. As a next step, I will conduct a detailed analysis incorporating behavioral economics and cultural studies to identify potential trends. Additionally, I will explore how emerging technologies like AI and blockchain could intersect with solar energy to inform innovative business strategies.

metadata.trigger: How can I identify and simulate an unexpected trend in the solar energy sector to uncover new business opportunities that others might be missing?
